reviewText: It's So Awesome. I Used To Rent It. And I Also Used To Own It Too. And It Was So Cool. And All The Characters Are Cool Too. I Was On The Edge Of My Seat All The Way Through It. And I Was Just Blown Away. So I Hope Everyone Buys This Movie. It's A Great Christmas Present For The Little Kids.
Title: N/A

reviewText: The COPS(Central Command Police Specialists) are a group of the best crime fighters in the U.S. led by fed agent V.P. Vess codename Bulletproof which are formed to fight against The Big Boss and his henchmen in Empire City the nation most corrupted and criminilized city in the year 2020.This set includes all 22 first episodes of the show first season.The show run from 1988-1989.In my country I saw it in the afternoons after kid's program.Here was a Mexican dubbed version which was very funny to hear.All characters have their names translated even C.O.P.S.(Comando Organizado de Policias Superiores).The set includes a bunch of nice extras including rare sketches not included in the air.Even technics explaining how comic book was concieved and created.The audio and video quality is excellent and the menu design is well done.The only flaw of this set is the non existence of any CC.I know is a kid's show and English is not too hard but Shout Factory! haven't thought about deaf and hard of hearing people(not myself) which deserves more in a Dvd.I hope more sets with the rest of season comes soon and this can be fixed.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Where's the CCs (closed captions)? I don't have hearing problems, but I often watch DVDs with them on. Other than that, I love this 4-Disc digipak set. You will too if you remember this show. I used to watch it everyday after school when I was 10 (& think it's criminal that the show lasted for just season  albeit 66 episodes). On this set, you get the 1st. 22 episodes with bonus material like slide shows of original sketch & concept art. Then there's 9 "C.O.P.S. for Kids" Over 8 1/2 hours of stuff in all.A final note: Don't be fooled by the annoying "Incredible World of Dic" logo on the back of the box. Each episode has the late-1980s "Kid in Bed" logo intact.

reviewText: Good news for all the fans of C.O.P.S. It has been revealed through the Shout Factory! message board that a second volume of the next 1/3 of the episodes left in the series will come out some time in 2010. It may just be a barebones releases without any extras, but we might get a few background artwork extras or an extras video which they wanted to include in volume 1 but couldn't get clearence on. So far no exact date has been announced as of yet but it will be sure to come later in the year and this looks like it will be a Shout Factory! consumer direct line which is only available through them. If this does sell well, they will in all likelyhood release the final 1/3 of the series on a volume 3 oneday to make a complete series of 3 volume dvds.
Title: N/A

reviewText: C.O.P.S. was a cartoon that aired in the later part of the 1980's. It continued to aire on TV into the early 1990's aswell. C.O.P.S. is a acronym for Centeral Orginization Police Specialists. This series was set in the future time (never given specific year setting, to my knowledge). The characters are all very diverse and entertaining! The cops are all the best cops from various big cities. And the crooks are the most ruthless,wreckless & dangerous crooks from allover. Here are the characters you'll see in this 4 disc DVD set.C.O.P.S. :BulletproofLongarmSundownMaceBowzer & BlitzHighwayMirrageBarricadeMainframeCrooks:Big BossButtons McBoom BoomRock CrusherBerserkoDr.Bad Vibes (w/ his robot sidekick Buzzbomb)NightshadeMisdermeanorWith this set your getting pretty great quality of the episodes. They are not remastered, but they look good even on LCD's! They look good in Blu-ray players or DVD. And the sound is good quality too! This DVD set is loaded with much of the series classic episodes! Also this set comes with bonuses like concept art,ect...This cartoon/series has it's own style,great animation,good stories,and odd & funny character which appear for single episodes. C.O.P.S. is a seriously great, but underrated cartoon of the 80's! If you grew up in the 80's, you may not even remember this cartoon or even the awesome toyline that Hasbro made! I highly recommend this DVD set to anyone that used to watch this cartoon,has just discovered this series, or that want to show this to their kids. My 9yr old son has been watching this DVD set and even playing with the old toys I have fr years now! Even kids of today can enjoy this cartoon!
summary: One of my childhood favorites...A slept on classic!

reviewText: I am drooling with excitement over this. Was a huge fan of this show growing up. It was my favorite behind Transformers. Kind of makes me wonder what else is coming out on DVD. Hopefully GI Joe or the Bionic 6. Can't wait till I get paid so I can order this. Recently got it and have been watching. have to say the quality is great unlike some of my other DVD's of old cartoons. Can't wait to see if they release anymore episodes of C.O.P.S
